threat: A local attacker could use this issue to cause DBus to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.
A local attacker could use this issue to cause DBus to stop responding, resulting in a denial of service.
A local attacker could use this issue to cause DBus to maintain persistent connections, possibly resulting in a denial of service.
A local attacker could use this issue to cause DBus to consume resources, possibly resulting in a denial of service.
A local attacker could use this issue to cause DBus to fail legitimate connection attempts, resulting in a denial of service.
